name: Grubby Gull
description:
What is Grubby Gull?

A short arcade game where you play as a seagull, trying to avoid being stepped on, whilst pecking back.  I didn't get around to sound, I am sorry...

How is Grubby Gull?

Arrows to move | Z to attack | Backspace to restart

Why is Grubby Gull?

This game was made for Mini Jam 108. The theme was Seaside and the limitation was everything dies with one hit

Let me know your high score
